headline: Applied Materials (NasdaqGS:AMAT) Announces 15 Percent Dividend Increase For Eighth Consecutive Year
summary: Applied Materials (NasdaqGS:AMAT) announced a notable 15% increase in its quarterly dividend, marking the eighth consecutive year of rising dividends, which may have offset some broader market pressures and contributed to its 2% price increase over the past week. This positive development comes amid a challenging week for technology stocks, with the Nasdaq dropping 4% due to concerns over tariffs and the economic outlook. The 1% drop in major indexes, including the Nasdaq, reflected...

headline: Applied Materials Increases Quarterly Cash Dividend by 15 Percent and Announces New $10 Billion Share Repurchase Authorization
summary: SANTA CLARA, Calif., March 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Applied Materials, Inc. today announced that its Board of Directors has approved a 15-percent increase in the quarterly cash dividend, marking eight consecutive years of higher dividends. The increase results in a quarterly dividend of $0.46 per share payable on June 12, 2025 to shareholders of record as of May 22, 2025. The Board also approved a new share repurchase authorization enabling Applied to buy back an additional $10 billion of it

raw.headline: Applied Materials Increases Quarterly Cash Dividend by 15 Percent and Announces New $10 Billion Share Repurchase Authorization
raw.summary: SANTA CLARA, Calif., March 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Applied Materials, Inc. today announced that its Board of Directors has approved a 15-percent increase in the quarterly cash dividend, marking eight consecutive years of higher dividends. The increase results in a quarterly dividend of $0.46 per share payable on June 12, 2025 to shareholders of record as of May 22, 2025. The Board also approved a new share repurchase authorization enabling Applied to buy back an additional $10 billion of it
